learningObjective:
1. On line 13 enter an expression to replace /* expression */ so that the Confirm statement evaluates to true
  2. On line 14 choose a relational operator to replace /* conditional */ so that the Confirm statement evaluates to true
referenceMaterial:
Relational Operators - There are 5 relational operators from which to choose, they are: 

=   <   <=    >    >=

:= is the assignment operator
